sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BIN_SaleRecordID, CONVERT(int,ISNULL(A.Quantity,0)) AS orginalQuantity FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BillCode = #tradeNoIF#

SELECT BIN_PickupBillMainID ,PickupBillNo ,RelevanceNo ,Relevance_OrginalNo ,BIN_SaleRecordID ,BIN_OrganizationID ,CounterCode ,BIN_EmployeeID ,EmployeeCode ,ConsumerType ,BIN_MemberInfoID ,MemberCode ,MemberLevel ,PickupDate ,PickupTime ,PickupQuantity ,TransactionType ,Comments FROM Sale.BIN_PickupBillMain A WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.PickupBillNo = #tradeNoIF#

SELECT BIN_PickupBillMainID, BIN_ProductVendorID as productId, BIN_ProductVendorID as productVendorID, BIN_ProductVendorID as promotionProductVendorID, UnitCode as unitcode, BarCode as barcode, DetailNo as detailNo, InventoryTypeCode as logicInventoryCode, Price as tagPrice, Quantity as quantity, DetailType as detailType, CASE WHEN DetailType='N' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS isPromotionFlag FROM Sale.BIN_PickupBillDetail A WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_PickupBillMainID = #pickupBillMainID#

sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Sale.BIN_SaleRecord SET PickupQuantity = ISNULL(PickupQuantity,0)+#quantity#, PickupStatus = (CASE WHEN ISNULL(PickupQuantity,0) + #quantity# >= ISNULL(Quantity,0) THEN '0' WHEN ISNULL(PickupQuantity,0) + #quantity# = 0 THEN '9' ELSE '3' END),
PickupDate = #pickupDate#,
WHERE BIN_SaleRecordID = #BIN_SaleRecordID#

UPDATE Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail SET PickupQuantity = ISNULL(PickupQuantity,0)+#quantity#,
WHERE BIN_SaleRecordID = #BIN_SaleRecordID# AND BIN_ProductVendorID = #productId#
